person.persName: Benjamin T. Perkins Sr. (Todd County attorney, and Circuit Court and County Clerk )

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky attorney and clerk. Kentucky native. Married Mariah Jane Porter Perkins in 1842. Father of Benjamin T. Perkins Jr., S. Perkins, and Lillie Perkins. Held eight slaves in 1860. Todd Circuit Court and County Clerk from c1859 to 1870.
